description: Good wallet for many crypto currencies
Stay away! This wallet steals your money. Never again!
so does it steal money or what? lol
there are people saying its great even though it actually steals your money
summary: this thing has a fake review problem

description:
Its simple and easy to use but you only get 3 choices of transaction fees which are already higher than normal. 
The fees recently have skyrocketed to 0.002 to move 0.001 which is absolutely ridiculous, hoping i can move what i have left when the fee's are lower.

Use electrum if you can, much better and you can adjust fees accordingly.

I used this walled for some time (3 months). Then, when I needed to reinstall it I used the BIP39 passphrase THEY provided me with during wallet creation (I used their copy/paste function and took some pictures of it), only to realise that it creates the wrong bitcoin wallet.

Now I lost access to my original wallet and with it all my funds.

$4k down the drain. Thanks coin wallet! :(
summary: It worked great until, only they give you the wrong passphrase!

description: This app won't allow you to set a long, safe password for everyday use. You either have to use your 12 word seed or a 4 number PIN, which is linked to your device. You should only use your seed if you're importing to another wallet, and a PIN? All your money secured by a 4 number PIN? That's insanity. This wallet should be criminal and these developers should really go find another line of work.
It works fine. Once it had generated a new Ethereum wallet, but setting the derivation path to "m" restored the previous one. So backup your keys.
Einfach zu bedienen aber trotzdem sind alle wichtigen Funktionen vorhanden. Für die tägliche Anwendung.

Es ist wie immer, es heisst es ist "free" aber jede Transaktion : Gutschrift, Belastung, Wechsel von ... inn... kosten Geld.
Betonung auch Gutschriften!!
Da in Bitcoin 0,000xxxx versteckt in einer Fußnote angemerkt werden, sind die realen Kosten nicht in Höhe nicht direkt sichtbar .
удобное приложение. Но все кашельки которые хранят аккаунт и приватные ключи на удаленном хостинге не безопасны...
